scripts.build-all: cd ./client && npm run build && cd .. && npm run build
scripts.build-all-production: cd ./client && npm run build && cd .. && npm run build --noEmitOnError
scripts.watch-all: rm -f client/build/static/assets.json && concurrently --names "client,server,node" --prefix-colors "green,cyan,yellow" "cd client && npm run watch" "npm run build -- --watch" "wait-on client/build/static/assets.json && NODE_PATH=build nodemon --watch build build/app/index.js"
scripts.watch-all-integration: rm -f client/build/static/assets.json && concurrently --names "client,server,node,cypress" --prefix-colors "green,cyan,yellow,orange" "cd client && npm run watch" "npm run build -- --watch" "wait-on client/build/static/assets.json && PORT=8082 DB_NAME=jawn_test NODE_PATH=build nodemon --watch build build/app/index.js" "wait-on client/build/static/assets.json && cd tests && PORT=8082 MONGO_HOST=localhost DB_NAME=jawn_test npm run cypress:open"
